condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Effective communication for development strategies through sustained community engagement promoting positive behaviours in both development and humanitarian context.

description.narrative: UNICEF C4D efforts resulted in sustained communication with communities around child survival, education, protection, water and sanitation. In 20182018, community mobilizers engaged 1,449,425 households, conducting 2403 school orientation sessions, 2176 community, 1723 youth club meetings, and 3147 religious leaders' meetings to create community demand for social services. | Status:Partially Met | As-of Date:31/12/2018
